content:
I’m a scientist focusing on applying life cycle assessment, techno-economic analysis through open-source tools to assess energy technologies (renewable energy, energy storage), sustainable buildings and districts.
I’m originally from where pandas come from. Other than my research, I’m also passionate for cooking, swimming, hiking and alternative music.
summary:
I’m a scientist focusing on applying life cycle assessment, techno-economic analysis through open-source tools to assess energy technologies (renewable energy, energy storage), sustainable buildings and districts.

title: Xiaojin Zhang
